VoiceList.Entry: “He---y! Is anyone here?”
“Give me a hand!”
Zangan “Hey it's you! You're still sane,right?”
Zangan “Then come over here and help me!”
Zangan “I'll check this house. You check that one over there!”
Zangan “Hey! What about the other houses?”
“…Sephi…roth”
“…Hey,ummm… Am I going to die?”
Cloud “Terrible…”
“Sephiroth… This is too terrible…”
Cloud “What's…next?”
Tifa “Stop it already!!”
Barret “This is bad… Just like Corel.”
Red XIII “This is terrible… Did Sephiroth do this?”
Cait Sith “This is insane…”
Yuffie “Wow… I didn't know it was THIS bad…”
Vincent “All this happened while I slept?”
Cid “This is terrible…”
Cloud “…This is what actually happened five years ago.”
Cloud “But…”
“It's probably not me that will come out of the Shinra mansion.”
“He's going to try and show us another stupid illusion.”
Cloud “See…didn't I tell you?”
Tifa “I don't want to…watch this. Cloud…Don't watch.”
Cloud “…What's wrong,Tifa? I told you before,right?”
“As long as we know that it's just an illusion,there's no need to be scared.”
Cloud “I'm…”
